name: YOU ARE STRANDED AT SEA, AND YOU ARE VERY HUNGRY
name_original: YOU ARE STRANDED AT SEA, AND YOU ARE VERY HUNGRY
description:
YOU ARE STRANDED AT SEA YOU ARE VERY HUNGRY YOU ALSO COMPULSIVELY WRITE.

Catch fish to get points, but don’t let too many get in your boat. You don’t want to sink, but you’re still very hungry, so get more fish. Be careful.

Featuring (in order of appearance)

•Programmer Art

•Puke physics.

•At least three unique fish

•Good Sounds

•Comfortable atmosphere

•Comes with mug
